name: Globulos Party
synopsis: Globulos Party is a collection of minigames very simple to understand and fun to master! The 20 games are: 4-Square, Arena, Basket, Bomber, Bomber-King, Croquet, Darts, Darts-King, Football, Funky-Football, Ice Hockey, Monster, PÃ©tanque, Pinball, Rally, Rugby, Snooker, Sumo, Tic-Tac-Toe, Volley. More than 15 hours of solo fun and an unlimited lifetime with the 3 multiplayer modes. You'd better practice before everybody beats you playing this game! The game has been elected "best game of the year" for handheld consoles by the Milthon French Awards jury who particularly appreciated playing the game in multiplayer. Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.
